name: Yeshiva University
scholarship_info: Merit-based scholarships available for international students. Check the official financial aid website for details and deadlines: https://www.yu.edu/osf

name: Wake Forest University
scholarship_info: Offers both need-based and merit-based aid to a limited number of international students. More info: https://admissions.wfu.edu/international/afford/

name: University of Rochester
scholarship_info: International students are eligible for merit-based scholarships. Details at: https://enrollment.rochester.edu/international/applying/scholarships-and-aid/

name: Pepperdine University
scholarship_info: Limited merit scholarships for international students at the time of admission. Visit: https://www.pepperdine.edu/financial-assistance/undergraduate/types/scholarships/

name: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute (RPI)
scholarship_info: Merit-based scholarships are available for all applicants, including international students. Details: https://admissions.rpi.edu/aid

name: Tulane University
scholarship_info: Offers partial merit-based scholarships for international students. Check their financial aid page: https://financialaid.tulane.edu/types-of-aid/international

name: Brandeis University
scholarship_info: Offers both need-based and merit-based scholarships to international students. Details: https://www.brandeis.edu/admissions/financial-aid/international.html

name: Syracuse University
scholarship_info: Merit-based scholarships are available for qualified international students. More info: https://www.syracuse.edu/admissions/cost-and-aid/scholarships/

name: Lehigh University
scholarship_info: Limited need-based financial aid and merit scholarships available for international students. Visit: https://finaid.lehigh.edu/undergraduate/international-students

name: Southern Methodist University (SMU)
scholarship_info: SMU offers merit-based scholarships for international students. Details can be found at: https://www.smu.edu/admission/financialaid/scholarships

name: Stevens Institute of Technology
scholarship_info: All undergraduate applicants are automatically considered for merit scholarships. Info: https://www.stevens.edu/...

name: Baylor University
scholarship_info: International students are eligible for academic (merit-based) scholarships. Check: https://admissions.baylor.edu/...

name: Worcester Polytechnic Institute (WPI)
scholarship_info: WPI offers merit-based scholarships to international students upon admission. Details: https://www.wpi.edu/...

name: Northeastern University
scholarship_info: Offers limited need-based and merit-based aid to international students. Check: https://studentfinance.northeastern.edu/...

name: Illinois Institute of Technology
scholarship_info: Generous merit scholarships for international students, like the 'Hebz-IIT Scholarship'. Visit: https://www.iit.edu/admissions-aid/scholarships

name: Clark University
scholarship_info: All applicants are considered for merit scholarships. Clark also offers a 'Global Scholars Program'.

name: American University
scholarship_info: Offers the 'AU Emerging Global Leader Scholarship' for one international student. Limited other merit awards.

name: Fordham University
scholarship_info: International students are eligible for a limited number of merit and talent-based scholarships.

name: Drexel University
scholarship_info: Drexel offers merit scholarships to qualified international applicants.

name: University of San Francisco
scholarship_info: USF offers merit scholarships to international students at the time of admission.

name: Villanova University
scholarship_info: Merit‑based Presidential and St. Martin de Porres scholarships; need‑based grants and Tuition Exchange opportunities. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

name: Texas Christian University (TCU)
scholarship_info: Merit‑based scholarships for international students, ranging from $15,000 to full tuition.

name: Santa Clara University
scholarship_info: Merit‑based scholarships considered automatically; check university financial aid site.

name: The New School
scholarship_info: Merit‑based scholarships available to international students at admission.

name: University of Denver
scholarship_info: Merit scholarships for international students, automatically considered—see DU financial aid site.

name: Rochester Institute of Technology (RIT)
scholarship_info: Generous merit‑based scholarships for international students, automatically considered.

name: Brigham Young University (BYU)
annual_tuition_cs_dept: $13,000–14,000 USD (non‑LDS rate, heavily subsidized; from your list)
scholarship_info: Limited merit & need‑based scholarships for international students; LDS sponsorship reduces cost.

scholarship_info: Competitive academic scholarships for international students; see Tulsa admissions site.
